EU's Borrell hopes lead of EU red sea mission will be known soonEU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said on Wednesday he was hopeful it could be decided later in the day which member state could lead the upcoming EU mission to protect vessels in the Red Sea, adding this operation could de launched before mid-February. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:54:06 GMT FZHJ7X4E2FIU5ITVLKN55V4P4M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eus-borrell-hopes-lead-eu-red-sea-mission-will-be-known-soon-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Indonesia chief security minister to tender resignation 'soon'Indonesia's Chief Security Minister and vice presidential candidate Mahfud MD on Wednesday said that he would tender his resignation to President Joko Widodo once he has the chance to meet the president. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:38:11 GMT WF4LLRLNVVP4HFB3RIXICQZM2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-chief-security-minister-tender-resignation-soon-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Modi's party set to bring contentious common civil laws in India through statesAn Indian state ruled by Prime Minister Narendra Modi's party is set to introduce contentious new common personal laws that will apply across religions next week, a template other state officials say they will look to follow. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:33:40 GMT ZFQE7UZ6K5PEXAWQKK2UCQ7FEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/modis-party-set-bring-contentious-common-civil-laws-india-through-states-2024-01-31/Krishn Kaushik, Rupam Jain, Saurabh Sharma世界印度
Woman attacked by shark in Sydney harbour thanks 'heroic' neighboursAn Australian woman bitten by a shark while swimming near the iconic Sydney Opera House has thanked her "heroic" neighbours for their help in a statement issued from her hospital bed on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:32:09 GMT 6YLIPWXV35OSHMHNDXSU6NILC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/woman-attacked-by-shark-sydney-harbour-thanks-heroic-neighbours-2024-01-31/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
German military headed for 56-bln-eur spending gap in 2028 - SpiegelThe German military is looking at a 56 billion-euro ($61 billion) deficit in 2028, once its special fund for defence spending is exhausted, according to a report in Spiegel news magazine that piles fresh doubt on Germany's rearmament pledge. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:30:24 GMT Z57XWDI625N3BFLTCGT5345ZDM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-military-headed-56-bln-eur-spending-gap-2028-spiegel-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Black smoke rising from Japan thermal power plant after explosion -NHKAn explosion was heard and black smoke was reported rising from the Taketoyo thermal power station in Aichi prefecture in central Japan, public broadcaster NHK reported on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:24:31 GMT ICO4LJZZSFIOLBQJSBPGWODRWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/explosion-black-smoke-taketoyo-power-plant-reported-fire-department-says-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Three years after coup, Myanmar junta chief under unprecedented pressureIn mid-January, at a small gathering in a cantonment town in Myanmar, hard line pro-military monk Pauk Kotaw suggested that the country's junta chief Min Aung Hlaing step down and his deputy take over. The crowd cheered in agreement, according to videos of the event posted on social media. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 06:55:43 GMT 6ULGOXKXRNPRRM3K2MO3HFFF3A https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/third-years-after-coup-myanmar-junta-chief-under-unprecedented-Pressure-2024-01-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
Yemen's Houthis threaten more attacks on US, British warshipsYemen's Iran-aligned Houthi group said on Wednesday it would keep up attacks on U.S. and British warships in the Red Sea in what it called acts of self defence, stoking fears of long-term disruptions to world trade. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 06:43:51 GMT VIGDLAYBTJPNJHNHRXMJL4CAPM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthis-say-they-will-target-us-british-warships-self-defense-al-massirah-2024-01-31/Jana Choukeir, Nadine Awadalla世界中东
Ukraine downs 14 out of 20 Russian drones over 5 regions in south, eastUkraine's air defences shot down 14 out of 20 drones launched by Russia in an overnight attack that injured one person and damaged commercial buildings, the military said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 06:29:18 GMT 7B5DVAJZUZPCVFBGB3JFZPJL7U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-downs-14-out-20- Russian-drones-over-5-regions-south-east-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Japan earthquake survivors battle unsanitary conditions with no running waterA month on from a huge earthquake that struck Japan's west coast, survivors are battling freezing and unsanitary conditions while tens of thousands of homes remain without running water. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 05:40:42 GMT ZKBHTBRIGRLCFBVQ7PLHSP64FY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-earthquake-survivors-battle-unsanitary-conditions-with-no-running-water-2024-01-31/Sakura Murakami, Tom Bateman世界亚太地区
Ship carrying 16,000 sheep and cattle stranded off AustraliaA ship carrying around 14,000 sheep and 2,000 cattle is marooned off the coast of Australia in sweltering heat after it was forced to abandon a trip through the Red Sea, causing outcry from people concerned about the animals' welfare. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 05:34:42 GMT SFP3HELSR5MOZIFSJDRJ6TABJI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ship-carrying-16000-sheep-cattle-stranded-off-australia-2024-01-31/Peter Hobson世界亚太地区
